name: Ash of Gods - Digital Art Collection
detailed_description:
A majestic collection of art for Ash of Gods created by AurumDust studios.

This DLC includes:


1) 60-page artbook with stunning hand-drawn game and concept art
2) Print-ready A2 digital poster
3) HD-quality desktop wallpapers
4) HD-quality map of Terminium in various languages
5) Digital comic, 24 pages telling the story of hero Thorn Brenin long in his days before the Reaping

CREDITS


Art-direction: Igor Podmogilnikov
Environment artist, Tech artist: Andrey Zherdev
Character artist, Artbook layout: Vladislav Samoylikov
UI-direction, Environment artist: Julia Zhokhova
General artist: Ildar Kharisov

short_description: A majestic collection of art for Ash of Gods created by AurumDust studios. This DLC includes a 60-page digital artbook, a print-ready poster, HD wallpapers, an HD map of the game world and a 24-page digital comic book.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium Dual CPU E2180 2.00GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 600M / ATI Radeon HD 5450 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 730 (1Gb) / Radeon R7 A10-7700K
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 – 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6490M 256 МБ
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOSX 10.10 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400S, 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6750M (512 Мб)
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2.0GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 (512MB) / ATI Radeon HD 2900 (512MB)
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 / SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66GHz / AMD Phenom
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 460 (1GB) / ATI Radeon HD 5850 (1GB)
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
